attributes.action: Facilitate the establishment of a National Brewing Museum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The former Bass Museum, now known as the Coors Visitor Centre, in Burton on Trent, is being closed by Coors at the end of June 2008.

We call upon the government to either work with Coors to establish a National Brewing Museum, or take the site into public ownership and establish a National Brewing Museum for the benefit of the nation.

We have a rich tradition of brewing real ale in this country and our brewing heritage needs to be preserved!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
